title: May Allah Love YOU, as you've loved ME for HIS Sake
transcript: Ahmed from Italy Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Sheikh Wa'alaykumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu How are you Sheikh? Alhamdulillahi Rabbil Alameen I just wanted to tell you I love you for the sake of Allah May Allah Azza Wa Jal love you as you've loved me for His sake That's it? Well, I think that's it. That's good. Okay, Ammar from India
